FeatureItem.Name: Properties
FeatureItem.Description:
To add spell-checking functionality to your project, do the following.
1. Add dictionary files to your project. You can download required dictionaries from the [{lnk_http://extensions.openoffice.org}OpenOffice Extensions] site. 2. Add an item of the appropriate dictionary type to the Dictionaries collection. 3. Specify the dictionary item properties.
You can customize the [{Dialogs_SpellChecking}Spell Checking] dialog properties. To learn more, see the [{lnk_#AspNet/CustomDocument4089}Spell Checker - Getting Started] documentation topic.
